text.section: To qualify for a license, an applicant shall be an individual who meets the requirements of this section.

The applicant shall:
Be of good moral character;
Be at least 18 years old;
Demonstrate competence in performing acupuncture by meeting one of the following standards for education or training:
Graduation from a course of training of at least 1,800 hours in acupuncture, including 300 clinical hours, that is:
Achievement of a:
Demonstrate the ability to communicate in the English language; and
Meet any other qualifications that the Board establishes in regulations.
